com.riskgame.controller

Class DiceController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.riskgame.controller.DiceController

  • public class DiceController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class aims to assign dice to the player based on the armies and then if the attacker wins it lets him move the armies to the defender's countries.
    Author:
    Nikitha

    • Method Detail

      • startDiceRoll

        public java.lang.String startDiceRoll(int attackerDiceCount,
                                      int defenderDiceCount,
                                      Country attackerCountry,
                                      Country defenderCountry)
        This method is called when the player rolls the dice during the attack phase. The number of the dice is based on the army count.
        Parameters:
        attackerDiceCount - - The dice count of the attacker
        defenderDiceCount - - The dice count of the defender
        attackerCountry - - The attacker's country
        defenderCountry - - The defender's country
        Returns:
        the attacker and defender's lost count

      • moveArmies

        public boolean moveArmies(int armiesToBeMoved,
                          Country attackerCountry,
                          Country defenderCountry,
                          GameMapGraph gameMapGraph,
                          int attackerDiceCount,
                          int defenderDiceCount)
        This method is called when after a win by the attacker it moves armies to the country it has won.
        Parameters:
        armiesToBeMoved - - the number of armies that is wishes to be moved
        attackerCountry - - the attacker country
        defenderCountry - - the defender country
        gameMapGraph - - the GameMapGraph object
        attackerDiceCount - - attacker's dice count
        defenderDiceCount - - defender's dice count
        Returns:
        boolean to suggest the move of army was successful

      • getPlayerForCountry

        public Player getPlayerForCountry(GameMapGraph mapGraph,
                                  java.lang.String countryName)
        This method gets the player based on the entered country.
        Parameters:
        mapGraph - - The GameMapGraph object
        countryName - - The entered country in game.
        Returns:
        - The player object
